module.name: Blacklist
module.changelog: *2.4.0* minor fixes, it translations, bumped for 2.4 *1.1.4* #2416 Enable Asterisk 1.6+ support *1.1.3.6* #2455 allow + and other valid dial digits *1.1.3.5* changed categories *1.1.3.4* bump for rc1 *1.1.3.3* added xml attribute needsenginedb *1.1.3.2* #2070 syntax fix from below *1.1.3.1* #2070 fix proper use of script tags *1.1.3* #2061 fixed to work with Asterisk 1.4 (wait for confirmation of 1) *1.1.2* #1638 remove duplicate of zapateller instruction *1.1.1* Add he_IL translation *1.1* First 2.2 release. Fix minor warnings.
